title: Are Mastery Tokens Reset after each season?
body: I honestly don't know. The reason I am asking is because I though I remembered having two for Talon but not enough essence to upgrade him. Now when I look the tokens are not there. I could just be remembering incorrectly but I thought there wouldn't be any trouble in asking.

replies.body:
Nope, mastery tokens and levels **do not** reset for each season.

If you have any other questions, let me know.
